globalEvents.name: Mission Briefing
globalEvents.eventText:
The blueprints you received were accurate. Every expensive vase and priceless artifact is right where it should be. Secrets must be profitable. The plan is simple: crack the safe, steal back the information, and escape to the nearby shuttle. Unfortunately, espionage is rarely that easy.

{-} Deploy the heroes to the blue highlighted space.
{-} The door is locked. A Rebel figure can interact with a terminal to discard that terminal. The door opens when both terminals are discarded.
{-} The mission will progress when the door opens.
{-} The Rebels lose when all heroes are wounded.

eventActions.theText: You know that the safe's combination is so complex that the Duke has hidden memory aids inside the building. If you can find them, cracking the safe would be that much easier.

entityProperties.name: Clue 1
entityProperties.theText:
A clue to the safe's combination might be hidden under the balcony railing.

{-} When a Rebel figure enters a space containing a clue, that figure tests {J} to try and find the clue.

globalEvents.name: End of Mission - Rebels win
globalEvents.eventText:
With the Alliance documents secured, your team rushes to the shuttle. The mission may have gotten more interesting than anticipated, but the heist was ultimately successful. Rebel secrets, and lives, have been saved today.

{-} The Rebels win the mission!

eventActions.theText: Did you play this mission as part of the "The Bespin Gambit" mini campaign?

globalEvents.name: End of Mission - Rebels lose
globalEvents.eventText:
Security and Imperial troops swarm to protect the Duke's secrets. Outgunned, you're forced to abandon the documents to make your desperate escape. The team is silent on the shuttle. This failure has likely cost Rebel lives.

{-} The Rebels lose the mission.

eventActions.theText: Did you play this mission as part of the "The Bespin Gambit" mini campaign?

globalEvents.name: Campaign Win Yes
globalEvents.eventText:
On the shuttle, you flip through the recovered intelligence, looking for any mention of stolen Imperial codes or a missing Rebel agent. There are transcripts and dossiers (many of which are wildly inaccurate), but nothing regarding a Rebel spy. 

Back at the bunker, Lando looks over the archives and stops at a shipping entry. “It’s not Rebel business, but it seems one of the Duke’ trusted smugglers disappeared from Port Town a few days ago.” Informants believe that Trandoshan slavers have made a stop on Cloud City. It’s possible they've gotten themselves mixed up in this mystery.

You descend to the seedier levels of the city and keep your ears open. While passing a particularly dark alley, an unmistakable hiss piques your interest. Eavesdropping, you learn that this Trandoshan is arranging the sale of slaves, and that the ISB has allowed him to capture some “special stock.” Until now this lead seemed dubious, but Lando’s intuition may pay off. The deal completed, the slaver retreats back to his base, but he is no longer alone.

{-} Each hero receives 3 XP.
{-} Heroes receive 300 credits per hero.
{-} The next active mission is “Freedom Fighters”.

globalEvents.name: Campaign Defeat Yes
globalEvents.eventText:
Empty handed, you return to the guerrilla headquarters to report the failure. Lando seems agitated as he addresses you. "That was a good lead we just lost." He paces for a while. "Well, I guess that leaves us with the bad leads."

"A... personal friend of mine has also gone missing. I’ve been trying to look him up, but found little. Before disappearing, he expressed concern over unauthorized maintenance access in Port Town. Get down there, tip well, and see if we can get lucky."

In the lower levels, a newly sympathetic bartender rats out a slaver sitting in the back. You tail the Trandoshan as he leaves and drop a few more credits on the counter.

{-} Each hero receives 2 XP.
{-} Heroes receive 300 credits per hero.
{-} The next active mission is “Freedom Fighters”.

globalEvents.name: Campaign No
globalEvents.eventText:
{-} Each hero receives 1 XP.
{-} Heroes receive 100 credits per hero.

globalEvents.name: Face to Face question
globalEvents.eventText: As the second security console is disabled, the door to the Duke's office slides open.

entityProperties.name: Office Door
entityProperties.theText:
A locked door leads to the Duke's office.

{-} The door is locked. The door opens when both terminals are discarded.

globalEvents.name: FtF Yes
globalEvents.eventText: The Duke looks up from his desk. “Davith, my boy, its so good to see you again. I hope you understand that keeping you in the dark was never personal. You were too valuable to the organization to risk losing.”

eventActions.theText: Block access to the safe.
The Duke's bodyguards rush forward to face you.

{-} The Imperial mission token represents the safe. A Rebel figure can interact with the safe ({I} or {J}) to try and crack it.
{-} The mission will progress when the safe is cracked.

globalEvents.name: Private Security
globalEvents.eventText: Alerted by your arrival, private security forces storm the compound.

eventActions.theText:
You start to work on the safe door. You immediately realize this will be complicated.

{-}  Test {J} or {I}. Apply +&Clues found& {B}. Apply +1 {B} for each strain token on the safe, then discard all strain tokens on the safe. Enter the number of successes below.

inputList.theText:
The safe door is simply too complex. You need to keep trying.

{-} Place 1 strain token on the safe for each {B} result gained.

globalEvents.name: Asset secured
globalEvents.eventText:
You finally crack the combination, yank open the safe door, and grab the information.

{-} Claim the token.
